Spy"/> Microsoft CEO Steve Ballmer has said that the Xbox 360 is not a games console. He told USA Today that its multimedia capabilities and Kinect support makes it an entertainment device. Xbox isn't a gaming console. Xbox is a family entertainment centre. It's a place to socialise, he said. "It's a place to watch TV. We have Hulu coming. It's the only system where you are the controller. Your voice, your gestures, your body."

"Congress received marching orders from the American people last November to end taxpayer funding of abortion," SBA List president Marjorie Dannenfelser told LifeNews.com. The bills introduced today by Representatives Joe Pitts ( R-PA), Chris Smith( R-NJ) and Daniel Lipinski ( D-IL) would get the job done. The 112th Congress understands the urgency of addressing the tragedy of nearly 4,000 abortions per day, over 52 million total since Roe v. Wade. Now is the time to pass laws that save lives and end taxpayer funding of abortion, she said.
